To stop the climate crisis we need

✅ To cut emissions 45%+ below ‘10 levels by ‘30
✅ $100B/yr to help developing countries’ mitigation & adaptation 

@g20 countries @EUCouncil @sussanley  @SitiNurbayaLHK @Michael_S_Regan and @ClimateEnvoy will you be our climate champions?

URGENT CALL TO:
📢 @ScottMorrisonMP
📢 @SussanLey
📢 @Birmo
PLEASE announce a BOLD new plan for emissions reductions (now, not later) AND more 💰 to help developing countries address climate change! THERE IS NO TIME TO WASTE.
